article_title: Skyrocketing health care costs finally starting to level out, helping state budget
article_text: The benefits to the state of the lower expected health care costs will be factored into the budget legislators will draft next year, and those extra payments will be millions less because of the reduced costs, he said.

article_metadata.description: For years, rising health care costs have battered state budgets and driven up retirement liabilities, but they are actually projected to decrease in the coming fiscal year.

og.description: For years, rising health care costs have battered state budgets and driven up retirement liabilities, but they are actually projected to decrease in the coming fiscal year.
